resources.string: Brace yourselves....Pantheon is back! A bigger, better and brighter edition of the biennial cultural fest. Over 50 events leave you spoilt for choice. Like, share and spread the word.

Q. Where can I register for activities?
A. Registration will be on-spot.

 Q. How can I get updates regarding the activities?
A. We'll send you a notification about any updates regarding our activities and the event. If you miss these notifications, you can also see them in the Updates screen.

 Q. How do I contact the event coordinators?
A. There's a call button at the bottom-right corner of every event; click on that to call the coordinator.
